tool_description: Analyzes customer verification data and interaction patterns to calculate fraud risk scores and recommend security actions.

time_since_last_login.description: Hours since customer's last successful login

error_messages: Invalid IP address: Provide valid IPv4 or IPv6 address format.
Invalid attempt counts: verification_attempts must be >= failed_attempts.
Account not found: Invalid account_id provided.
Risk assessment timeout: Unable to complete risk analysis within time limit.
usage: Provide account_id as minimum requirement. Include additional context like customer_ip, device_fingerprint, and attempt counts for more accurate risk assessment.

risk_score.description: Calculated risk score (0-100, higher is riskier)

risk_level.description: Risk classification: low, medium, high, or critical

recommended_actions.description: Recommended security actions based on risk level

requires_manual_review.description: Whether case should be escalated for manual review
